refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in faustcsound. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Faustdsp will instantiate a Faust program compiled with faustcompile.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifac -- a handle to a compiled Faust program, produced by faustcompile.
ihandle -- a handle to the Faust DSP instance, which can be used to run the program with faustplay and access its controls with faustctl.
